reviews.review: The class subject is interesting but the Professor talks super fast and very quickly goes over material. Tests are theory and application-based and one of the most difficult styles of tests Ive taken. Seriously felt like a grad school class.

Class is one of the most interesting classes I've taken at UMD. But the final paper and the final exam are worth 50% of your grade. She also deleted the class before she put in the final grade which is annoying
